PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_Tolerance
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties expressing the tolerance relating to locating and shaping of an intended element or feature. Range diameters are non-negative describing a linear, rectangular or boxed region .

PropertyDef.Name: ToleranceDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the tolerance associated to the element or feature, its source and implications.

PropertyDef.Name: ToleranceBasis
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the basis of the tolerance requirement

PropertyDef.Name: OverallTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range tolerance associated to the intended shape and position in XYZ.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range tolerance associated to the horizontal shape and position in X, if different to the overall tolerance.

PropertyDef.Name: OrthogonalTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range tolerance associated to the horizontal shape and position in Y, if different to the overall tolerance.

PropertyDef.Name: VerticalTolerance
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range tolerance associated to the vertical shape and position in Z, if different to the overall tolerance.

PropertyDef.Name: PlanarFlatness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range flatness associated to the intended shape and position in XYZ.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalFlatness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range flatness associated to the horizontal surface in XY, if different to the overall flatness.

PropertyDef.Name: ElevationalFlatness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range flatness associated to the elevational surface in ZX, if different to the overall flatness.

PropertyDef.Name: SideFlatness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range flatness associated to the side surface in YZ, if different to the overall flatness.

PropertyDef.Name: OverallOrthogonality
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range orthogonality associated to the intended shape and orientation in XYZ.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalOrthogonality
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range orthogonality associated to the horizontal shape and orientation in X, if different to the overall orthogonality.

PropertyDef.Name: OrthogonalOrthogonality
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range orthogonality associated to the horizontal shape and orientation in Y, if different to the overall orthogonality.

PropertyDef.Name: VerticalOrthogonality
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range orthogonality associated to the vertical shape and orientation in Z, if different to the overall orthogonality.

PropertyDef.Name: OverallStraightness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range straightness associated to the intended shape.

PropertyDef.Name: HorizontalStraightness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range straightness associated to the horizontal shape in X, if different to the overall straightness.

PropertyDef.Name: OrthogonalStraightness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range straightness associated to the horizontal shape in Y, if different to the overall straightness.

PropertyDef.Name: VerticalStraightness
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicative (95%-100%) range straightness associated to the vertical shape in Z, if different to the overall straightness.
